io.werval.api.http

Interface Cookies

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable< Cookies.Cookie>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MutableCookies 

    public interface Cookies
extends Iterable<Cookies.Cookie>
    HTTP Cookies.

    Cookies are loaded from the Cookie header of a RequestHeader.

    See:

    • RFC2109 - HTTP State Management Mechanism - 1997,
    • RFC2965 - HTTP State Management Mechanism - 2000,
    • RFC6265 - HTTP State Management Mechanism - 2011.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes  
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Cookies.Cookie
      HTTP Cookie.

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Returns:
        TRUE if there's no cookie, FALSE otherwise

      • has

        boolean has(String name)
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the cookie
        Returns:
        TRUE if there's an cookie with the given name

      • names

        Set<String> names()
        Returns:
        The Set of HTTP Cookie names.

        Parameters:
        name - Name of the HTTP Cookie
        Returns:
        The Cookie

      • value

        String value(String name)
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the HTTP Cookie
        Returns:
        Value for this HTTP Cookie name or an empty String
